title: 2014 Hashtags: #BringBackOurGirls Made Nigerian Schoolgirls All Of 'Ours'
teaser: As part of a series on hashtag activism in 2014, Audie Cornish speaks with Obiageli Ezekwesili of the Open Society Foundation. Ezekwesili was one of the early promoters of the hashtag #bringbackourgirls, about schoolgirls kidnapped in Nigeria in April.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
